comment.author: 13033121@N02
comment._content: This photo is identified incorrectly. The photo was taken in 1955. The Pax men are L-R Wayne Lapp, J. Ben Yoder, Mark Conrad, Unidentified, Peter Nusbaumer, Robert Weaver & Carl Smeltzer

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thank you so much for taking time to provide this information. I have made the correction in the caption. The only information available to us was a date of 1962 written in pencil on the back of this card. It must have been written in error. It sounds like you may have had a connection with this group and it is very helpful for the archives and the research community to have this updated information. Thanks again!
